title: Restless Carrier
desc:
Post 5403
*You've always had a need to kill. The gun in your hands fills you with a sort of adrenaline. It's hard to explain, but sooner or later you might go insane with this power held in your hands.*

Abilities
- You may shoot a player, dealing them a Basic attack. (3 uses)
- Alternatively, you may go **Berserk**. Shooting a random player for every bullet you currently have, and losing every bullet.

Attributes
- You take one night to reload all of your bullets.
- Once you've reloaded, a 2 Night Timer begins.
- If you do not shoot a player by the night the timer reaches 0, you will automatically go **Berserk**.
- Killing a Town member causes you to go **Berserk** the next night.
- You do not die of guilt.
